info.title: Fraud
info.description:
Using technology-enabled techniques, fraudulent attacks are becoming more sophisticated and their consequences more severe. Fraud can happen across multiple accounts and jurisdictions. Being able to accurately identify fraud in real-time, and before it occurs, is essential to protect customersâ€™ assets and brands. Trust is ever more critical in a digital banking world.

This API enables you to:

- Identify/prevent suspicious activity.
- Retrieve the result of a scanned transaction by a customer.
- Determine if a transaction is blocked.

**Note**: To use this API, request an API key from apidocs.temenos.com. Create an account with the community to get started.

This is a snapshot of the Swagger document. The complete document is provided as part of a FCM release via the [FCM Team](https://www.temenos.com/contact-us/#contact).

To learn more about Temenos FCM visit [temenos.com](https://www.temenos.com/products/financial-crime-mitigation/)

post.description: Retrieves the result of a scanned transaction made by the customer

schema.description: The request body. It's an XML representation.

application/xml.example:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<tns:FTNewFlow xmlns:tns="http://www.temenos.com/T24/event/AMLFundsTransfer/FTNewFlow"
        xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.temenos.com/T24/event/AMLFundsTransfer/FTNewFlow AMLFundsTransfer-FTNewFlow.xsd"
        xmlns:ns0="http://www.temenos.com/T24/event/Common/EventCommon"
        xmlns:ns1="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtOrderingDetails"
        xmlns:ns2="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtBeneficiaryDetails"
        xmlns:ns4="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtTxnDetails">
    <tns:eventCommon>
        <ns0:application xmlns:ns0="http://www.temenos.com/T24/event/Common/EventCommon">FUNDS.TRANSFER</ns0:application>
        <ns0:companyId xmlns:ns0="http://www.temenos.com/T24/event/Common/EventCommon">GB0010001</ns0:companyId>
        <ns0:operator xmlns:ns0="http://www.temenos.com/T24/event/Common/EventCommon">INPUTTER</ns0:operator>
        <ns0:today xmlns:ns0="http://www.temenos.com/T24/event/Common/EventCommon">2017-04-17</ns0:today>
        <ns0:transactionStage xmlns:ns0="http://www.temenos.com/T24/event/Common/EventCommon">SERVICE-OPERATION</ns0:transactionStage>
        <ns0:eventId xmlns:ns0="http://www.temenos.com/T24/event/Common/EventCommon">3b8c4aee-d13f-40a6-b040-9218527cad1f</ns0:eventId>
        <ns0:creationTime xmlns:ns0="http://www.temenos.com/T24/event/Common/EventCommon">2017-09-01T08:26:02.333Z</ns0:creationTime>
    </tns:eventCommon>
    <tns:iftorderingdetails>
        <ns1:debitAccountNo xmlns:ns1="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtOrderingDetails">11509</ns1:debitAccountNo>
        <ns1:debitAccountName xmlns:ns1="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtOrderingDetails">ROBERT BRANSON</ns1:debitAccountName>
        <ns1:orderingCustAcct xmlns:ns1="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtOrderingDetails">11509</ns1:orderingCustAcct>
        <ns1:dbtCustStreet xmlns:ns1="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtOrderingDetails">120 CAMPDEN HILL ROAD</ns1:dbtCustStreet>
        <ns1:dbtCusTownCon xmlns:ns1="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtOrderingDetails">KENSINGTON LONDON</ns1:dbtCusTownCon>
        <ns1:dbtCusPostCd xmlns:ns1="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtOrderingDetails">W8 7AR</ns1:dbtCusPostCd>
        <ns1:dbtCusCountry xmlns:ns1="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtOrderingDetails">UNITED KINGDOM</ns1:dbtCusCountry>
        <ns1:dbtCusName1 xmlns:ns1="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtOrderingDetails">Mr Robert Branson</ns1:dbtCusName1>
    </tns:iftorderingdetails>
    <tns:iftbeneficiarydetails>
        <ns2:creditAccountNo xmlns:ns2="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtBeneficiaryDetails">15377</ns2:creditAccountNo>
        <ns2:creditAccountName xmlns:ns2="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtBeneficiaryDetails">CREDIT SUISSE</ns2:creditAccountName>
        <ns2:benAccountNo xmlns:ns2="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtBeneficiaryDetails">22200</ns2:benAccountNo>
        <ns2:benCustomerNo xmlns:ns2="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtBeneficiaryDetails">outside guy</ns2:benCustomerNo>
        <ns2:accountWithBank xmlns:ns2="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtBeneficiaryDetails">DEUTDEFF</ns2:accountWithBank>
        <ns2:cdtCusCountry xmlns:ns1="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtBeneficiaryDetails">UNITED KINGDOM</ns2:cdtCusCountry>
    </tns:iftbeneficiarydetails>
    <tns:iftintermediarydetails/>
    <tns:ifttxndetails>
        <ns4:txnType xmlns:ns4="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtTxnDetails">OT03</ns4:txnType>
        <ns4:debitCcy xmlns:ns4="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtTxnDetails">CHF</ns4:debitCcy>
        <ns4:dbtValueDate xmlns:ns4="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtTxnDetails">20170417</ns4:dbtValueDate>
        <ns4:creditCcy xmlns:ns4="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtTxnDetails">CHF</ns4:creditCcy>
        <ns4:amtDebited xmlns:ns4="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtTxnDetails">5000.00</ns4:amtDebited>
        <ns4:amtCredited xmlns:ns4="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtTxnDetails">5000.00</ns4:amtCredited>
        <ns4:id xmlns:ns4="http://www.temenos.com/T24/AMLService/FtTxnDetails">FTTESTO000NE</ns4:id>
    </tns:ifttxndetails>
    <tns:iftcustomeraccountdetails/>
</tns:FTNewFlow>

400.description: Invalid request body. It should be a valid xml message.

403.description: The authenticated user is not authorized to call the SAP engine..

500.description: Something doesn't go well while communicating with the SAP engine.

blocked.description: Whether the transaction is blocked or not. Possible values: YES, NO
